sn35.75:1.1: Atha kho annataro bhikkhu …pe… bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.75:1.2: “amukasmim, bhante, vihare annataro bhikkhu navo appannato abadhiko dukkhito balhagilano.
sn35.75:1.3: Sadhu, bhante, bhagava yena so bhikkhu tenupasankamatu anukampam upadaya”ti.
sn35.75:2.1: Atha kho bhagava navavadanca sutva gilanavadanca, “appannato bhikkhu”ti iti viditva yena so bhikkhu tenupasankami.
sn35.75:2.2: Addasa kho so bhikkhu bhagavantam duratova agacchantam.
sn35.75:2.4: Atha kho bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.75:2.7: Nisidi bhagava pannatte asane. Nisajja kho bhagava tam bhikkhum etadavoca:
sn35.75:2.8: “kacci te, bhikkhu, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam, kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti no abhikkamanti, patikkamosanam pannayati no abhikkamo”ti?
sn35.75:3.2: na kho mam, bhante, atta silato upavadati”ti.
sn35.75:4.1: “No ce kira te, bhikkhu, atta silato upavadati, atha kinca te kukkuccam ko ca vippatisaro”ti?
sn35.75:5.1: “Na khvaham, bhante, silavisuddhattham bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanami”ti.
sn35.75:6.1: “No ce kira tvam, bhikkhu, silavisuddhattham maya dhammam desitam ajanasi, atha kimattham carahi tvam, bhikkhu, maya dhammam desitam ajanasi”ti?
sn35.75:7.1: “Anupadaparinibbanattham khvaham, bhante, bhagavata dhammam desitam ajanami”ti.
sn35.75:8.2: Sadhu kho tvam, bhikkhu, anupadaparinibbanattham maya dhammam desitam ajanasi.
sn35.75:8.3: Anupadaparinibbanattho hi, bhikkhu, maya dhammo desito.
sn35.75:11.9: yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tampi niccam va aniccam va”ti?
sn35.75:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.75:15.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.75:17.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati …pe…
sn35.75:17.5: Yampidam manosamphassapaccaya uppajjati vedayitam sukham va dukkham va adukkhamasukham va tasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.75:17.6: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.75:17.7: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
sn35.75:18.2: Attamano so bhikkhu bhagavato bhasitam abhinandi.
sn35.75:18.3: Imasminca pana veyyakaranasmim bhannamane tassa bhikkhussa anupadaya asavehi cittam vimucciti.
